job.description: dice is the leading career destination for tech experts at every stage of their careers our client ktek resourcing llc is seeking the following apply via dice todayltbrgtltbrgthello greetings for the day my name is harsh and i work as a technical recruiter for ktek resourcing we are searching for professionals for below business requirement for one of our client please read through the requirement and connect with us in case it suits your profile job role site reliability engineer sre location denver co new york city ny rate ushr on cc note should have good experience in monitoring using appdynamics job description develop model and set up proactive monitoring for transaction flows automate operations runbooks handson programming skills typically this will include scripting languages eg python powershell unix shells etc experience in l support apm product expertise experience in production management performance engineering experience with implementing monitoring using appdynamics thanks regards harsh varma technical recruiter ktek resourcing india canada united states southwest freeway suite houston tx houstontx tel emailskype mailto
